histogram.name: SimpleCache.CacheSizeOnInit
histogram.summary: The size of the cache at the time that the index has finished initializing.

histogram.name: SimpleCache.ConsistencyResult
histogram.summary: Record the outcome of the simple DiskCache consistency check. The consistency check is executed every time a simple DiskCache is initialized. This check includes both inspecting the schema on disk and upgrading the schema to the latest version if necessary.

histogram.name: SimpleCache.ConsistencyResultAfterIndexFilesDeleted
histogram.summary: Record the final consistency check value after index files have been deleted from an empty simple DiskCache. This histogram will tell us how often the index deletion code results in a functioning cache. It will also tell us what kind of consistency failures cannot be recovered due to index file deletion.

histogram.name: SimpleCache.CreationToIndex
histogram.summary: The time from the creation of the simple cache backend until the index has been loaded from disk.

histogram.name: SimpleCache.CreationToIndexFail
histogram.summary: The time from the creation of the simple cache backend until the index fails to load.

histogram.name: SimpleCache.DidDeleteIndexFilesAfterFailedConsistency
histogram.summary: Record if any simple DiskCache index files were deleted from an otherwise empty cache after the cache failed the initialization consistency check. This histogram will tell us how often the deletion code is triggering and modifying the disk.

histogram.name: SimpleCache.DiskCloseLatency
histogram.summary: The time to close (write out footers and close the file) the cache entry on disk. Includes only successful operations.

histogram.name: SimpleCache.DiskCreateLatency
histogram.summary: The time to access (open for creation and write initial headers) the cache entry on disk. Includes only successful operations.

histogram.name: SimpleCache.DiskDoomLatency
histogram.summary: The time to remove the cache entry on disk. Includes only individually doomed entries, not entries bulk-erased during eviction.

histogram.name: SimpleCache.DiskOpenLatency
histogram.summary: The time to access (open and read headers from all files) the cache entry on disk. Includes only successful operations.

histogram.name: SimpleCache.DiskWriteLatency
histogram.summary: The time to write a chunk to the cache entry on disk. Includes only successful operations.

histogram.name: SimpleCache.EntryCreationTime
histogram.summary: The time, in ms, spent creating a new entry on disk. This measures time from when the method got removed from SimpleEntryImpl's operation queue till when the callback is about to be invoked, and includes all Open and Create operations, despite what the name may suggest.

histogram.name: SimpleCache.Eviction.EntryCount
histogram.summary: The number of entries to be erased in an eviction.

histogram.name: SimpleCache.Eviction.TimeToDone
histogram.summary: Time spent completing an eviction.

histogram.name: SimpleCache.Eviction.TimeToSelectEntries
histogram.summary: Time spent selecting entries for eviction.

histogram.name: SimpleCache.FileDescriptorLimiterAction
histogram.summary: This even is emitted when SimpleCache is forced to either close some files due to being over FD limit, or reopen files it had to close due to such limit earlier.

histogram.name: SimpleCache.HeaderSize
histogram.summary: The size of the header stream of a Simple Cache entry, emitted every time the headers are written or rewritten.

histogram.name: SimpleCache.IndexCreatedEntryCount
histogram.summary: The number of entries in a newly created index file.

histogram.name: SimpleCache.IndexFileStateOnLoad
histogram.summary: The state the index file is at when an attempt is made to load from it.

histogram.name: SimpleCache.IndexInitializeMethod
histogram.summary: The method used to initialize the simple cache index.

histogram.name: SimpleCache.IndexNumEntriesOnInit
histogram.summary: The number of entries in the index at the time that the index has finished initializing.

histogram.name: SimpleCache.IndexRestoreTime
histogram.summary: Time (as measured on the worker pool) spent restoring the index file by iterating directory entries.

histogram.name: SimpleCache.MaxCacheSizeOnInit
histogram.summary: The maximum allowed size of the cache at the time that the index has finished initializing.

histogram.name: SimpleCache.OpenEntryIndexState
histogram.summary: At the time that an entry is opened, the state of that entry in the index.

histogram.name: SimpleCache.OriginalConsistencyResultBeforeSuccessfulRetry
histogram.summary: Record the original consistency error produced by a simple DiskCache before a retry was attempted and succeeded. This histogram will tell us what kind consistency errors can be recovered from in practice.

histogram.name: SimpleCache.RetryConsistencyResult
histogram.summary: Record the outcome of the simple DiskCache consistency check after retrying initialization on an empty cache directory. The retry may occur after corrupt index files were deleted from an empty cache. The retry may also occur if the original failed initialization left an empty directory without any index files. This histogram will tell us how often the retry succeeds in recovering caches and also which consistency checks cannot be recovered.

histogram.name: SimpleCache.StaleIndexExtraEntryCount
histogram.summary: Count of the number of entries recorded in the index, but not actually present in the cache. Recorded each time a stale index is found and a directory rescan is required.

histogram.name: SimpleCache.StaleIndexMissedEntryCount
histogram.summary: Count of the number of entries present in a cache, but not recorded in the index. Recorded each time a stale index is found and a directory rescan is required.

histogram.name: SimpleCache.StaleIndexQuality
histogram.summary: The quality of a "stale" index compared to a full directory rescan. Recorded immediately after every directory scan for stale indexes.

histogram.name: SimpleCache.SyncOpenPrefetchMode
histogram.summary: The kind of prefetching performed, if any, when executing SimpleSynchronousEntry::ReadAndValidateStream0AndMaybe1().

histogram.name: SimpleGeolocation.Request.Event
histogram.summary: Events in reqests processing of IP-based SimpleGeolocation.

histogram.name: SimpleGeolocation.Request.HasCellTowers
histogram.summary: This boolean histogram counts SimpleGeolocationRequests carrying a nonzero number of cell towers.

histogram.name: SimpleGeolocation.Request.HasWiFiAccessPoints
histogram.summary: This boolean histogram counts SimpleGeolocationRequests carrying nonzero number of WiFi access points.

histogram.name: SimpleGeolocation.Request.ResponseCode
histogram.summary: Http response codes in IP-based SimpleGeolocation.

histogram.name: SimpleGeolocation.Request.ResponseFailureTime
histogram.summary: The time elapsed between the sending of the first API request and the time the final (failed) response was recorded. Includes all retries.

histogram.name: SimpleGeolocation.Request.ResponseSuccessTime
histogram.summary: The time elapsed between the sending of the first API request and the time the final (successfull) response was recorded. Includes all retries.

histogram.name: SimpleGeolocation.Request.Result
histogram.summary: Result of SimpleGeolocationRequest.

histogram.name: SimpleGeolocation.Request.Retries
histogram.summary: Number of retries until the final response was recorded.
